p: According to the results above, 5 mg mL −1 was selected as the best tryptophan concentration to investigate the efficacy of bacterial endophytes to produce IAA at different time courses (2–14 days) ( Figure 3). Data analysis highlighted that the highest productivity of IAA was achieved on the 10th day for all isolates with varied amounts ranging from 56 ± 1.7 to 117 ± 6.0 µg mL −1. The endophytic bacterial strains PI-8 and PI-10 had the highest IAA production (117 ± 6.0 and 108 ± 4.6 µg mL −1, respectively) at day 10 ( p ≤ 0.05) ( Figure 3).
